headline: Amcor (NYSE:AMCR) Advances Packaging Innovation With Recyclable AmFiber™ Performance Paper In Brazil
summary: Amcor (NYSE:AMCR) has recently highlighted its commitment to sustainability with the success of its AmFiber™ Performance Paper recycling initiative in Brazil. This development underscores the company's efforts to align with a circular economy model, enhancing its packaging recyclability. Despite this positive impetus, Amcor's share price remained relatively flat over the past week compared to the market's broader 1.4% rise, suggesting that while the news is constructive, it did not...

headline: Greif Earnings Beat Estimates in Q2, Revenues Increase 1% Y/Y
summary: GEF Q2 earnings rise 43% y/y. The company boosts the 2025 EBITDA outlook despite the top-line shortfall.

raw.headline: Greif Earnings Beat Estimates in Q2, Revenues Increase 1% Y/Y
raw.summary: GEF Q2 earnings rise 43% y/y. The company boosts the 2025 EBITDA outlook despite the top-line shortfall.

headline: Turning the page on packaging waste: Amcor's AmFiber™ Performance Paper proves recyclability in Brazil
summary: Amcor (NYSE: AMCR, ASX: AMC), a global leader in developing and producing responsible packaging solutions, announced that its AmFiber™ Performance Paper has been proven recyclable in Brazil's mixed-paper recycling stream, marking a significant step forward in more sustainable packaging innovation.
